question: How do the advanced premium tax credits work with Pennie? The FFM is tax credits through the federal side. How are the tax credits paid through Pennie?
text:
How do the advanced premium tax credits work with Pennie? The FFM is tax credits through the federal side. How are the tax credits paid through Pennie?
          
        
Advanced Premium Tax Credits (APTC) and Cost-Sharing Reductions (CSR) will work the same on Pennie as on the FFM. APTC will continue to be paid by the federal government, while the same eligibility rules will continue to apply for CSR.
